prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a manta ray, with playful eyes and a cheerful demeanor.
Show me a unique Pokemon that has a blue, aquatic body and a friendly personality.
Design a Pokemon inspired by sea creatures, featuring rounded shapes and vibrant colors.
Imagine a small, cute water-type Pokemon that loves to swim and play in the ocean.
Make a Pokemon that has a streamlined body and is known for its agility in water.
Generate a character with a blend of blue hues and a happy expression, perfect for a water habitat.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea with its playful and friendly nature.
